name: Sylas
subtitle: the Unshackled
description: Raised in one of Demacia's lesser quarters, Sylas of Dregbourne has come to symbolize the darker side of the Great City. As a boy, his ability to root out hidden sorcery caught the attention of the notorious mageseekers, who eventually imprisoned him... See More

abilities.name: Petricite Burst
abilities.description: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

abilities.name: Chain Lash
abilities.description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. 

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

abilities.name: Kingslayer
abilities.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

abilities.name: Abscond / Abduct
abilities.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
